name: melody cardigan
notes:
the melody cardigan is a very simple knitting pattern which is easy to follow and pleasent to knit.

you will need:

xs: 2 skeins s: 3 skeins m: 3 skeins
l: 4 skeins xl: 4 skeins
of kid silk by woollala.com* (each skein is 420 metres in 50 grams)
if you want your cardigan to be longer you should have more yarn!

9 mm 120 cm and 40 cm circular needles (it’s the most comfortable but you can use shorter if you wish)

8 mm 120 cm circular needles (it’s the most comfortable but you can use shorter if you wish)

5 mm double pointed needles (or you can use the magic loop techniqe)

8 stitch markers

2 additional needles or thrads to hold the resting stitches

tapestry needle

have fun knitting!
